ygData.subject: Re: A little ray of sunshine on an otherwise cloudy day
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 24 I did 241 dmg with Harm Touch last night, so either there s no change, or it s only for players at a higher level than 24.  I d love to hear from
ygData.messageBody:
At level 24 I did 241 dmg with Harm Touch last night,
so either there's no change, or it's only for players
at a higher level than 24. I'd love to hear from
others, but I don't have much hope yet.

Atrocity

--- Countess Bathory D'Allatu
<countess_bathory_69@...> wrote:
> Has anyone else noticed this, and have you figured
> out
> the new formula for it?
> Used to be: level * 10 + 1
> Example: level 20 * 10 + 1 = 201 DMG
>
> Could be that its after a certain level too.
>
> Anyway, I will be paying closer attention to it
> today.
> Maybe I'll just HT a giant rat or something.
>
> =====
> Wherever a Light shines .. a Shadow is born.
> Bathory D'Allatu
> Cazic-Thule
